When the Pay@ screen opens, the various payment options are displayed: - By scanning the QR code, you can pay with any of the following Apps: ABSA, Capitec, FNB, Scan to pay, Shoprite App, Nedbank, RMB, SnapScan and Zapper - You can also selecct to pay with Capticec Pay, your credit card, make an EFT, use your Shoprite money market account or pay at a store, if you prefer - The following stores support Pay@ payments: Ackermans, Boxer, Builders Warehouse, Cambridge Food, Checker, Flash, Game, Kazang, Makro, Pep, Pick'n Pay, Rhino, Shoprite, Spar, Top it Up, USave Alternatively, you can take control of your finances and make payment via our self service channels below. Simply click the image to access the self-service channel: If you have any questions or concerns about making payment online, please do not hesitate to contact us and we will talk you through the process. We can be reached on 087 286 0222 or email infoncs@nimblegroup.co.za Remember: Any amount you pay will get you closer to a zero balance and that all important "PAID-UP" letter. Yours sincerely, Manager: Nimble Credit Solutions The Nimble Group. 35 Brickfield Rd, Salt River, Cape Town. We prioritise Rent so we have a place to stay while we keep looking for new contracts. we have payment arrangements with many Accounts as a result at Present we have no new Free-lance contracts and Temp offers for 2024 Right now I have 8 days of work and my husband 1 day of work for December 2023 both of us do not have a guaranteed income yet for the new year. See attached payment arrangement made on WhatsApp to pay R500 per month until we are able to find permanent employment. Please may I request: that no phone calls be made but rather emails and Whatsapp reason being that on 01 December I was admitted to Emergency at Hospital for stage 2 Hypertension after my blood pressure shot up due to stress I have been instructed to keep my stress levels down to help keep my blood pressure down I find phone calls intimidating and stressful under the circumstances we are in BUT I can read and communicate with emails and whatsapp messages Please consider the above favourably. Knowing that you have honoured your obligations and kept your commitments will allow you to enjoy this festive season with your loved ones without worries about your financial situation in 2024. Let us help you manage your FNB with a balance of R3116.72 HERE IS THE DEAL: You qualify for a settlement discount of 50.00% To find out exactly how much you need to pay - and how much you will save - please call us on 087 286 0222 or email infoncs@nimblegroup.co.za HOW TO PAY EFT OR CASH DEPOSIT AT THE BANK Bank FNB Account Holder 7Norman Bissett and Associates Branch Code 250205 Account Number 62153815950 Please use the ref: 43870751 PAY@: 1. Select https://payat.io/qr/ 2. Your Pay@ number is 1140365495201 3. When the Pay@ screen opens, the various payment options are displayed: - By scanning the QR code, you can pay with any of the following Apps: ABSA, Capitec, FNB, Scan to pay, Shoprite App, Nedbank, RMB, SnapScan and Zapper - You can also selecct to pay with Capticec Pay, your credit card, make an EFT, use your Shoprite money market account or pay at a store, if you prefer - The following stores support Pay@ payments: Ackermans, Boxer, Builders Warehouse, Cambridge Food, Checker, Flash, Game, Kazang, Makro, Pep, Pick'n Pay, Rhino, Shoprite, Spar, Top it Up, USave Alternatively, you can take control of your finances and make payment via our self service channels below. Simply click the image to access the self-service channel: If you have any questions or concerns about making payment online, please do not hesitate to contact us and we will talk you through the process. We can be reached on 087 286 0222 or email infoncs@nimblegroup.co.za Remember: Any amount you pay will get you closer to a zero balance and that all important "PAID-UP" letter. Yours sincerely, Manager: Nimble Credit Solutions The Nimble Group. 35 Brickfield Rd, Salt River, Cape Town. We prioritise Rent so we have a place to stay while we keep looking for new contracts. we have payment arrangements with many Accounts as a result at Present we have no new Free-lance contracts and Temp offers for 2024 Right now I have 8 days of work and my husband 1 day of work for December 2023 both of us do not have a guaranteed income yet for the new year. See attached payment arrangement made on WhatsApp to pay R500 per month until we are able to find permanent employment. Please may I request: that no phone calls be made but rather emails and Whatsapp reason being that on 01 December I was admitted to Emergency at Hospital for stage 2 Hypertension after my blood pressure shot up due to stress I have been instructed to keep my stress levels down to help keep my blood pressure down I find phone calls intimidating and stressful under the circumstances we are in BUT I can read and communicate with emails and whatsapp messages Please consider the above favourably. We prioritise Rent so we have a place to stay while we keep looking for new contracts. we have payment arrangements with many Accounts as a result at Present we have no new Free-lance contracts and Temp offers for 2024 Right now I have 8 days of work and my husband 1 day of work for December 2023 both of us do not have a guaranteed income yet for the new year. See attached payment arrangement made on WhatsApp to pay R500 per month until we are able to find permanent employment. Please may I request: that no phone calls be made but rather emails and Whatsapp reason being that on 01 December I was admitted to Emergency at Hospital for stage 2 Hypertension after my blood pressure shot up due to stress I have been instructed to keep my stress levels down to help keep my blood pressure down I find phone calls intimidating and stressful under the circumstances we are in BUT I can read and communicate with emails and whatsapp messages Please consider the above favourably. When the Pay@ screen opens, the various payment options are displayed: - By scanning the QR code, you can pay with any of the following Apps: ABSA, Capitec, FNB, Scan to pay, Shoprite App, Nedbank, RMB, SnapScan and Zapper - You can also selecct to pay with Capticec Pay, your credit card, make an EFT, use your Shoprite money market account or pay at a store, if you prefer - The following stores support Pay@ payments: Ackermans, Boxer, Builders Warehouse, Cambridge Food, Checker, Flash, Game, Kazang, Makro, Pep, Pick'n Pay, Rhino, Shoprite, Spar, Top it Up, USave Alternatively, you can take control of your finances and make payment via our self service channels below. Simply click the image to access the self-service channel: If you have any questions or concerns about making payment online, please do not hesitate to contact us and we will talk you through the process. We can be reached on 087 286 0222 or email infoncs@nimblegroup.co.za Remember: Any amount you pay will get you closer to a zero balance and that all important "PAID-UP" letter. Yours sincerely, Manager: Nimble Credit Solutions The Nimble Group. 35 Brickfield Rd, Salt River, Cape Town. We prioritise Rent so we have a place to stay while we keep looking for new contracts. we have payment arrangements with many Accounts as a result at Present we have no new Free-lance contracts and Temp offers for 2024 Right now I have 8 days of work and my husband 1 day of work for December 2023 both of us do not have a guaranteed income yet for the new year. See attached payment arrangement made on WhatsApp to pay R500 per month until we are able to find permanent employment. Please may I request: that no phone calls be made but rather emails and Whatsapp reason being that on 01 December I was admitted to Emergency at Hospital for stage 2 Hypertension after my blood pressure shot up due to stress I have been instructed to keep my stress levels down to help keep my blood pressure down I find phone calls intimidating and stressful under the circumstances we are in BUT I can read and communicate with emails and whatsapp messages Please consider the above favourably. Knowing that you have honoured your obligations and kept your commitments will allow you to enjoy this festive season with your loved ones without worries about your financial situation in 2024. Let us help you manage your FNB with a balance of R3116.72 HERE IS THE DEAL: You qualify for a settlement discount of 50.00% To find out exactly how much you need to pay - and how much you will save - please call us on 087 286 0222 or email infoncs@nimblegroup.co.za HOW TO PAY EFT OR CASH DEPOSIT AT THE BANK Bank FNB Account Holder 7Norman Bissett and Associates Branch Code 250205 Account Number 62153815950 Please use the ref: 43870751 PAY@: 1. Select https://payat.io/qr/ 2. Your Pay@ number is 1140365495201 3. When the Pay@ screen opens, the various payment options are displayed: - By scanning the QR code, you can pay with any of the following Apps: ABSA, Capitec, FNB, Scan to pay, Shoprite App, Nedbank, RMB, SnapScan and Zapper - You can also selecct to pay with Capticec Pay, your credit card, make an EFT, use your Shoprite money market account or pay at a store, if you prefer - The following stores support Pay@ payments: Ackermans, Boxer, Builders Warehouse, Cambridge Food, Checker, Flash, Game, Kazang, Makro, Pep, Pick'n Pay, Rhino, Shoprite, Spar, Top it Up, USave Alternatively, you can take control of your finances and make payment via our self service channels below. Simply click the image to access the self-service channel: If you have any questions or concerns about making payment online, please do not hesitate to contact us and we will talk you through the process. We can be reached on 087 286 0222 or email infoncs@nimblegroup.co.za Remember: Any amount you pay will get you closer to a zero balance and that all important "PAID-UP" letter. Yours sincerely, Manager: Nimble Credit Solutions The Nimble Group. 35 Brickfield Rd, Salt River, Cape Town. We prioritise Rent so we have a place to stay while we keep looking for new contracts. we have payment arrangements with many Accounts as a result at Present we have no new Free-lance contracts and Temp offers for 2024 Right now I have 8 days of work and my husband 1 day of work for December 2023 both of us do not have a guaranteed income yet for the new year. See attached payment arrangement made on WhatsApp to pay R500 per month until we are able to find permanent employment. Please may I request: that no phone calls be made but rather emails and Whatsapp reason being that on 01 December I was admitted to Emergency at Hospital for stage 2 Hypertension after my blood pressure shot up due to stress I have been instructed to keep my stress levels down to help keep my blood pressure down I find phone calls intimidating and stressful under the circumstances we are in BUT I can read and communicate with emails and whatsapp messages Please consider the above favourably. We prioritise Rent so we have a place to stay while we keep looking for new contracts. we have payment arrangements with many Accounts as a result at Present we have no new Free-lance contracts and Temp offers for 2024 Right now I have 8 days of work and my husband 1 day of work for December 2023 both of us do not have a guaranteed income yet for the new year. See attached payment arrangement made on WhatsApp to pay R500 per month until we are able to find permanent employment. Please may I request: that no phone calls be made but rather emails and Whatsapp reason being that on 01 December I was admitted to Emergency at Hospital for stage 2 Hypertension after my blood pressure shot up due to stress I have been instructed to keep my stress levels down to help keep my blood pressure down I find phone calls intimidating and stressful under the circumstances we are in BUT I can read and communicate with emails and whatsapp messages Please consider the above favourably. When the Pay@ screen opens, the various payment options are displayed: - By scanning the QR code, you can pay with any of the following Apps: ABSA, Capitec, FNB, Scan to pay, Shoprite App, Nedbank, RMB, SnapScan and Zapper - You can also selecct to pay with Capticec Pay, your credit card, make an EFT, use your Shoprite money market account or pay at a store, if you prefer - The following stores support Pay@ payments: Ackermans, Boxer, Builders Warehouse, Cambridge Food, Checker, Flash, Game, Kazang, Makro, Pep, Pick'n Pay, Rhino, Shoprite, Spar, Top it Up, USave Alternatively, you can take control of your finances and make payment via our self service channels below. Simply click the image to access the self-service channel: If you have any questions or concerns about making payment online, please do not hesitate to contact us and we will talk you through the process. We can be reached on 087 286 0222 or email infoncs@nimblegroup.co.za Remember: Any amount you pay will get you closer to a zero balance and that all important "PAID-UP" letter. Yours sincerely, Manager: Nimble Credit Solutions The Nimble Group. 35 Brickfield Rd, Salt River, Cape Town. We prioritise Rent so we have a place to stay while we keep looking for new contracts. we have payment arrangements with many Accounts as a result at Present we have no new Free-lance contracts and Temp offers for 2024 Right now I have 8 days of work and my husband 1 day of work for December 2023 both of us do not have a guaranteed income yet for the new year. See attached payment arrangement made on WhatsApp to pay R500 per month until we are able to find permanent employment. Please may I request: that no phone calls be made but rather emails and Whatsapp reason being that on 01 December I was admitted to Emergency at Hospital for stage 2 Hypertension after my blood pressure shot up due to stress I have been instructed to keep my stress levels down to help keep my blood pressure down I find phone calls intimidating and stressful under the circumstances we are in BUT I can read and communicate with emails and whatsapp messages Please consider the above favourably. Knowing that you have honoured your obligations and kept your commitments will allow you to enjoy this festive season with your loved ones without worries about your financial situation in 2024. Let us help you manage your FNB with a balance of R3116.72 HERE IS THE DEAL: You qualify for a settlement discount of 50.00% To find out exactly how much you need to pay - and how much you will save - please call us on 087 286 0222 or email infoncs@nimblegroup.co.za HOW TO PAY EFT OR CASH DEPOSIT AT THE BANK Bank FNB Account Holder 7Norman Bissett and Associates Branch Code 250205 Account Number 62153815950 Please use the ref: 43870751 PAY@: 1. Select https://payat.io/qr/ 2. Your Pay@ number is 1140365495201 3. When the Pay@ screen opens, the various payment options are displayed: - By scanning the QR code, you can pay with any of the following Apps: ABSA, Capitec, FNB, Scan to pay, Shoprite App, Nedbank, RMB, SnapScan and Zapper - You can also selecct to pay with Capticec Pay, your credit card, make an EFT, use your Shoprite money market account or pay at a store, if you prefer - The following stores support Pay@ payments: Ackermans, Boxer, Builders Warehouse, Cambridge Food, Checker, Flash, Game, Kazang, Makro, Pep, Pick'n Pay, Rhino, Shoprite, Spar, Top it Up, USave Alternatively, you can take control of your finances and make payment via our self service channels below. Simply click the image to access the self-service channel: If you have any questions or concerns about making payment online, please do not hesitate to contact us and we will talk you through the process. We can be reached on 087 286 0222 or email infoncs@nimblegroup.co.za Remember: Any amount you pay will get you closer to a zero balance and that all important "PAID-UP" letter. Yours sincerely, Manager: Nimble Credit Solutions The Nimble Group. 35 Brickfield Rd, Salt River, Cape Town.
